VLIB_createBlobList

Detailed Description


Functions

int32_t VLIB_createBlobList (VLIB_CCHandle *handle, VLIB_blobList *blobObj)

Function Documentation

int32_t VLIB_createBlobList ( VLIB_CCHandle *  handle,
VLIB_blobList *  blobObj 
)

Description:
This function works on the output of connected component labeling (CCL). It fills the VLIB_blobList from the internal results of the CCL handle.
Parameters:
[in] *handle Pointer to CC handle, the CC handle is used for connected component labeling and contains all the internal results of cc labeling including the global interval image (VLIB_CCHandle)
[out] blobObj Pointer to the output blob structure which consists of the blob list and some common blob parameters (VLIB_blobList)
Assumptions:
  • All pointers are assumed not aliased.
